# Courses<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
There are multiple types of [resources](resources.md) you may need.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
Knowledge is a resource too.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
This page shows the places to increase your knowledge in a learning<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
environment,<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
as provided by courses and training.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "Why is this a useful resource?"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    This page is the only page that combines all the courses of all the<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    different providers.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    Additionally, it can be used to<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    - Detect broken links to courses, as indicated by the :warning:<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
      emoji<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    - Detect inconsistencies when the same course is advertised by multiple<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
      providers, as the same course will be displayed multiple times<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "How is this list generated and updated?"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    On a daily basis,<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    [the `update_content.yaml` continuous integration script](https://github.com/NBISweden/SCoRe_user_doc/blob/main/.github/workflows/update_content.yaml)<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    checks the websites of the course providers and updates the list,<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    using [the `scoreto` R package](https://github.com/richelbilderbeek/scoreto).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "What does the :warning: mean?"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    It means that the course provider has supplied a broken course URL.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "A course provider is missing!"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If a course provider is missing, please [contribute](CONTRIBUTING.md)<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    or [contact us](contact_us.md).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    To be a course provider, one needs to provide for a learning<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    environment with a live and human teacher.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If a course providers provides an online self-study<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    learning environment, it is listed<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    at [the course materials page](course_materials.md).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "My course is missing!"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If your course is missing, please [contribute](CONTRIBUTING.md)<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    or [contact us](contact_us.md).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "My course can be displayed better!"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If your course can be displayed better,<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    please [contribute](CONTRIBUTING.md)<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    or [contact us](contact_us.md).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "My course is displayed twice!"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    The same course can be listed by multiple providers.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If so, this page will show the same course muliple times.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    This is intentional: it allows a course provider to check<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    if all course information is shared identical across the providers.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
???- question "How can I read this data is a machine-friendly format?"<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    Most of this information can be<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    [downloaded as a `.csv`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NBISweden/SCoRe_user_doc/refs/heads/main/docs/courses.csv).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    The only difference is there is no indicator that a URL is broken.<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    <!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    If you could use this information in the `.csv` file,<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    please [contribute](CONTRIBUTING.md)<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
    or [contact us](contact_us.md).<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- courses_2.md is machine-generated and pasted below this file, courses_1.md --><!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
<!-- DO NOT EDIT -->
